scripts.release: npm test && npm run build && node scripts/release.mjs
scripts.release:all: npm test && npm run build && node scripts/release.mjs all
scripts.release:dry: npm test && npm run build && DRY_RUN=1 node scripts/release.mjs all
scripts.test: npm run test:classes && npm run test:syntax && node scripts/verify-deps.mjs && node scripts/verify-prefixes.mjs && node scripts/verify-tokens.mjs && node scripts/verify-dark.mjs
scripts.version:check: npm run version:check:packages && npm run version:check:root && npm run version:sync
scripts.validate: npm run test:classes && npm run version:check
